name: AdditionalInterestSubtype
title: Additional Interest Subtype
description: Qualifiers that further describe the scope or conditions of an additional interest designation.

concept.definition: Applies automatically to all qualifying parties required by written contract, without scheduling each one individually.
Applies only to parties specifically listed by name in the policy or endorsement.
The policy responds first without seeking contribution from the additional interest's own policies.
Coverage for the additional interest is limited to operations at a specified location.
Coverage applies to the additional interest only during the insured's ongoing work at a project.
Coverage applies to the additional interest for liability arising after the insured's work at a project is completed.
Coverage for project owners or general contractors arising from the named insured's work on their project.
